TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CodeGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示抽象基类，必须从该基类中导出代码组的所有实现。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of code groups must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是构建基块的代码访问安全性策略。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组可以具有其自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展到任意数量的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组有一个确定根据该程序集的证据是否属于给定的程序集的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 将应用这些其成员资格条件与给定程序集的证据匹配的代码组。Only those code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly's evidence will be applied. 如果匹配的代码组有子代码组，然后同样应用这些子级的成员身份条件还与匹配提供的证据。If a matching code group has child code groups, then those children whose membership conditions also match the supplied evidence will likewise be applied.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition membershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement policy) cil managed
Protected Sub New (membershipCondition As IMembershipCondition, policy As PolicyStatement)

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成员条件，它测试证据以确定此代码组是否应用策略。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 形式为权限集和特性的代码组的策略声明，这些权限集和特性将被授予匹配成员条件的代码。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个基本代码组，并且应从自定义代码组的构造函数调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 您可以添加子代码组使用方法。You can add child code groups using the method.

A list of child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子代码组的顺序非常重要的某些代码组。The order of child code groups is significant for certain code groups. > [!NOTE] > 返回值是子代码列表的副本。The return value is a copy of the child code list. 不要使用返回的列表来添加一个子代码组;请改用方法。Do not use the returned list to add a child code group; instead, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使代码组的深层副本，从而还生成的代码组所包含的所有对象的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

This property is a string description of the merge logic used by the code group to resolve the permissions granted by its child code groups. It is meant to aid administrators using the code group, but is not used by the policy system.

summary.span: 获取或设置与该代码组关联的策略声明。

span.span: Gets or sets the policy statement associated with the code group.
The policy statement for the code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证据匹配的成员资格条件时，策略声明将适用于程序集中的代码。The policy statement applies to code in assemblies when evidence matches the membership condition. 此外可以通过将策略语句传递给构造函数设置此属性。This property can also be set by passing a policy statement to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例设置的代码组。The following example sets the for a code group. [!code-cpp[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，解析证据集的代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement that consists of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括评估的子代码组的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 有关、 还解析其成员条件与指定的证据匹配的所有子代码组，并且与父级联合代码组的策略语句组合生成的所有策略语句。For a , all child code groups whose membership condition match the specified evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements are combined with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每个子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于如何这些子组的方法的工作原理。Each child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别来确定加载的代码从生成的策略语句和代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，解析匹配的代码组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是匹配代码组的树的根。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有相同的评估特性。This method has the same evaluation characteristics as . 返回的代码组包含子代码组，因而也就可以有根据需要以反映所提供的证据匹配的代码组的完整集合的子代码组。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.
